function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 through viral contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection and inactivation of viruses on surfaces","Technologies":"Antiviral coatings, nanotechnology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in public places","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Temporary and potentially harmful nature of existing cleaning and disinfectant solutions","Impact":"Risk of side effects and incomplete virus inactivation","Mitigation":"Development of long-term antiviral coatings with low toxicity","Technologies":"Nanotechnology, graphene-based nanomaterials","People":"Manufacturers, researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, manufacturing companies"},{"Description":"Use of nanotechnology for COVID-19 mitigation","Impact":"Possible unknown long-term effects of nanotechnology on human health","Mitigation":"Thorough safety testing and regulation of nanotechnology-based solutions","Technologies":"Nanotechnology, graphene-based nanomaterials","People":"General public, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, research institutions"}]}
